nestle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to move into a comfortable position, pressing your head or body against someone or against something soft
nestle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Sarah lay there peacefully, the child nestling by her side.
He nestled his head against her shoulder.
nestle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to be surrounded by something, especially hills or countryside
nestle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a tiny village nestling among the foothills of the French Alps
nestle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a large international company that makes Nescaf√© coffee and milk-based products such as chocolate and baby milk
